title: Solidago decurrens Lour. controls LPS-induced acute lung injury by reducing inflammatory responses and modulating the TLR4/NF-κB/NLRP3 signaling pathway.
abstract: Acute lung injury (ALI) is a lethal respiratory disease associated with severe inflammatory responses. Solidago decurrens Lour. (SdL) has been shown to exhibit anti-inflammatory and antibacterial activities. However, the pharmacological effects of SdL on ALI and the underlying mechanisms remain unexplored.
